verses.roman:
kona dine kona bhāve śloka-paṭhana
sei śloka āsvādite rātri-jāgaraṇa

synonyms: kona dine—sometimes; kona bhāve—in some emotion; śloka-paṭhana—reciting the verses; sei śloka—those verses; āsvādite—to taste; rātri-jāgaraṇa—keeping awake at night.
translation: Sometimes the Lord would be absorbed in a particular emotion and would stay awake all night reciting related verses and relishing their taste.
